citeinfo.origin: National Park Service Geologic Resources Evaluation (GRE) program
citeinfo.title: Digital Geologic Unit Information Table for Booker T. Washington National Monument and Vicinity, Virginia (NPS, GRE, BOWA, BOWAGLG1)

citeinfo.origin: National Park Service Geologic Resources Evaluation (GRE) program
citeinfo.title: Digital Geologic Map of Booker T. Washington National Monument and Vicinity, Virginia

descript.abstract: The Digital Geologic Unit Information (GLG1) Table consists of information concerning geologic units present in the digital geologic data for the Digital Geologic Map of Booker T. Washington National Monument and Vicinity, Virginia. The data were completed as a component of the Geologic Resources Evaluation (GRE) program, a National Park Service (NPS) Inventory and Monitoring (I&M) funded program that is administered by the NPS Geologic Resources Division (GRD). The data were attributed as per the NPS GRE Geology-GIS Geodatabase Data Model v. 1.4. (available at: http://science.nature.nps.gov/im/inventory/geology/GeologyGISDataModel.cfm). The data is available as a table in a 9.1 personal geodatabase (bowa_geology.mdb). The table is also available as a table export (.E00) file (BOWAGLG1.E00), and as a DBASEIV (.DBF) table file (BOWAGLG1.DBF).
descript.purpose: Data intended to assist NPS personnel in the protection and management of Booker T. Washington National Monument.
descript.supplinf: This dataset is just one component of the Digital Geologic Map of Booker T. Washington National Monument and Vicinity, Virginia. The data layers (feature classes) that comprise the Digital Geologic Map of Booker T. Washington National Monument and Vicinity, Virginia include: BOWAATD (Geologic Attitude and Observation Points), BOWAFLD (Folds), BOWAFLT (Faults), BOWAGLG (Geologic Units), BOWAGLGA (Geologic Contacts) and BOWASYM (Fault, Fold and Other Map Symbology). There are three additional ancillary map components, the Geologic Unit Information (BOWAGLG1) Table, the Source Map Information (BOWAMAP) Table and the Map Help File (BOWA_GEOLOGY.HLP). Refer to the NPS GRE Geology-GIS Geodatabase Data Model v. 1.4 (available at: http://science.nature.nps.gov/im/inventory/geology/GeologyGISDataModel.cfm) for detailed table specifications including attribute field parameters, definitions and domains, and relationship classes.

attracc.attraccr: Attribution was derived and checked with the source map(s). Attribution was checked (QCd) for errors. Users of this data are advised to FULLY and CAREFULLY READ the "DISTRIBUTION LIABILITY" section of this metadata before using the data.

dataqual.logic: GIS data in 9.1 personal geodatabase (.MDB), table export (.E00) file and DBASEIV (.DBF) table file formats.
dataqual.complete: Data is considered complete to the extent of the source map(s).

citeinfo.origin: Elizabeth V. M. Campbell, Daniel Sheres, and C. R. Berquist, Jr
citeinfo.title: Digital spatial data for a portion of the Roanoke, VA 1:100,000 30x60 minute quadrangle - Hardy, Goodview, Redwood, Moneta SW 7.5-minute quadrangles

pubinfo.publish: Commonwealth of Virginia Department of Mines, Minerals and Energy - Division of Mineral Resources (CVDMME-DMR)

srcinfo.srccontr: Features were derived from source data produced by the Commonwealth of Virginia Department of Mines, Minerals and Energy - Division of Mineral Resources. Source data attribution was used to attribute features, as per the NPS GRE Geology-GIS Geodatabase Data Model v. 1.3.1.

procstep.procdesc: Table attribution was derived and checked using the source map(s). Relationship classes were also used to ensure attribution consistency. See the NPS GRE Geology-GIS Geodatabase Data Model v. 1.4 (available at http://science.nature.nps.gov/im/inventory/geology/GeologyGISDataModel.cfm) for more details. Tables were exported from the geodatabase to INFO table and DBASEIV (.DBF) formats.

overview.eaover: Refer to the NPS GRE Geology-GIS Geodatabase Data Model v. 1.4. (available at http://science.nature.nps.gov/im/inventory/geology/GeologyGISDataModel.cfm) for detailed table attribute field definitions as well as attribute field coded domain values.

cntinfo.cntinst: GRE data are available at the NPS Data Store: http://science.nature.nps.gov/nrdata

distinfo.resdesc: GIS map data available in BOWAGDB.ZIP (9.1 personal geodatabase (.MDB) file), BOWACOV.ZIP (table export (.E00) file) or BOWASHP.ZIP (DBASEIV (.DBF) table file)
distinfo.distliab:
The National Park Service shall not be held liable for improper or incorrect use of the data described and/or contained herein. These data and related graphics are not legal documents and are not intended to be used as such.
The information contained in these data is dynamic and may change over time. The data are not better than the original sources from which they were derived. It is the responsibility of the data user to use the data appropriately and consistent within the limitations of geospatial data in general and these data in particular. The related graphics are intended to aid the data user in acquiring relevant data; it is not appropriate to use the related graphics as data.
The National Park Service gives no warranty, expressed or implied, as to the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of these data. It is strongly recommended that these data are directly acquired from an NPS server and not indirectly through other sources which may have changed the data in some way. Although these data have been processed successfully on a computer system at the National Park Service, no warranty, expressed or implied is made regarding the utility of the data on another system or for general scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty. This disclaimer applies to both to individual use of the data and aggregate use with other data.

onlinopt.accinstr: Download the digital geologic-GIS map (Larger Work Citation) metadata (BOWA_GREMAP.XML) or the .ZIP download file (BOWAGDB.ZIP) with the personal geodatabase (.MDB) file containing the table.

Download the digital geologic-GIS map (Larger Work Citation) metadata (BOWA_GREMAP.XML) or the .ZIP download file (BOWASHP.ZIP) with the DBASEIV (.DBF) table file.
